thread.section_title: Eagle Optics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eagle Optics | www.eagleoptics.com | 2 of 110
thread.title: Joyce Andrew
thread.title_full: Eagle Optics reviewed by Joyce Andrew

author: Joyce Andrew
title: Joyce Andrew
text:
Needed help selecting a birding scope and tripod with head. I had done a lot of research prior to calling. Took me a while to decide and made several phone calls.
Everyone was polite and helpful. This is at least my fourth purchase from Eagle Optics; always receive great customer service.
I would recommend this company without reservation. Very pleased with the items I purchased; good quality for the price.
